name: The Necropolis of Eternal Night
description: A cursed city where the dead walk and death itself holds dominion
author: Misthollow Team

14000.title: Gates of the Dead
14000.description:
Massive iron gates stand open, rusted and covered in dark stains. Beyond
lies a city shrouded in perpetual gloom - no matter the time of day,
darkness reigns here. The gates are worked with images of skulls and
bones, and inscriptions in dead languages warn visitors away. The air is
cold and still, carrying the stench of decay. From within comes the
sound of moaning and the scrape of bone on stone. The stone walls press
close, cold and damp. Darkness clings to every surface.

north.description: A passage leads to The Threshold Of The Necropolis

south.description: The way leads to Avenue of Tombs

14000.name: Gates of the Dead

14001.title: Avenue of Tombs
14001.description:
A wide street stretches into the necropolis, lined on both sides with
mausoleums and tombs. Many stand open, their doors torn from hinges,
their occupants gone. The cobblestones are cracked and broken, with
weeds growing between. Street lamps that once burned with eternal flame
are dark and cold. Shambling figures can be seen in the distance, moving
with the jerky gait of the undead. The floor is slick with moisture. The
air is thick and hard to breathe.

north.description: The way leads to Gates of the Dead

south.description: The way leads to Plaza of Bones

east.description: The way leads to Crypt Row

west.description: The way leads to The Pauper's Field

14001.name: Avenue of Tombs

14002.title: Plaza of Bones
14002.description:
This central plaza is paved with bones - skulls, ribs, femurs, all
fitted together in grotesque mosaic. A fountain at the center once
flowed with water; now it weeps blood that never stops. Broken statues
ring the plaza, their faces chiseled away. This was once the heart of
the city. Now it's a gathering place for the undead, where they stand in
silent congregation. The stone walls press close, cold and damp.
Darkness clings to every surface.

north.description: The way leads to Avenue of Tombs

south.description: The way leads to Temple of the Death God

east.description: The way leads to Mausoleum District

west.description: The way leads to The Charnel House

14002.name: Plaza of Bones

14003.title: Crypt Row
14003.description:
Family crypts line this street, each grander than the last - competition
in death as in life. Many are ornately carved with family crests and
accomplishments. The doors are sealed with chains and locks, but many
have been broken from within. Scraping sounds come from inside the
crypts, and shadows move in the darkness. The wealthy dead do not rest
easy here. The air is thick and hard to breathe. The stone walls press
close, cold and damp.

west.description: The way leads to Avenue of Tombs

south.description: The way leads to Mausoleum District

14003.name: Crypt Row

14004.title: The Pauper's Field
14004.description:
Here the poor were buried in mass graves, unmarked and unmourned. The
ground has opened, vomiting forth its dead. Skeletal hands reach from
the earth, and corpses drag themselves from shallow graves. The smell is
overwhelming. These undead are mindless and vicious, attacking anything
living that approaches. This is the most dangerous area for the
unprepared. The floor is slick with moisture. The silence is oppressive
and watchful.

east.description: The way leads to Avenue of Tombs

14004.name: The Pauper's Field

14005.title: Temple of the Death God
14005.description:
This temple was dedicated to the god of death - not as evil, but as
natural transition. But the necromancers perverted it, turning it into a
shrine to undeath. The altar is stained black with blood sacrifices.
Candles burn with cold flames that give no warmth. The air itself seems
dead here. Necromancers use this place for their darkest rituals. The
stone walls press close, cold and damp. The air is thick and hard to
breathe.

north.description: The way leads to Plaza of Bones

south.description: The way leads to Sanctum of Dark Rites

14005.name: Temple of the Death God

14006.title: Mausoleum District
14006.description:
Elaborate mausoleums dominate this district, some rising three stories
high. They're built of marble and granite, designed to last forever.
Statues of angels with broken wings stand watch. Inside, the wealthy
dead sleep in ornate coffins - or at least they used to. Many have risen
as vampires, retaining intelligence and cunning along with terrible
hunger. The silence is oppressive and watchful. The stone walls press
close, cold and damp.

north.description: The way leads to Crypt Row

west.description: The way leads to Plaza of Bones

south.description: The way leads to Vampire's Mausoleum

14006.name: Mausoleum District

14007.title: The Charnel House
14007.description:
This building was used to process the dead - preparing bodies for
burial. Now it's a horror show. Bodies in various states of decay lie on
tables. Bones are sorted in piles. The tools of the undertaker's trade
hang on walls. Ghouls have claimed this place, feeding on the dead and
occasionally the living. The smell is indescribable. Darkness clings to
every surface. The floor is slick with moisture.

east.description: The way leads to Plaza of Bones

south.description: The way leads to Ghoul Warren

14007.name: The Charnel House

14008.title: Sanctum of Dark Rites
14008.description:
Deep within the temple, the necromancers perform their most forbidden
rituals. A circle of power is drawn on the floor in blood and ash.
Skulls arranged in patterns channel dark energy. Books of necromancy lie
open on lecterns. This is where the living are transformed into undead,
where souls are trapped, where death itself is twisted. The evil here is
palpable. The stone walls press close, cold and damp. The floor is slick
with moisture.

north.description: The way leads to Temple of the Death God

14008.name: Sanctum of Dark Rites

14009.title: Vampire's Mausoleum
14009.description:
This grand mausoleum belongs to an ancient vampire. The coffin within is
carved from a single piece of obsidian and lined with silk. The vampire
sleeps here during the day, venturing out at night to feed. The
mausoleum is richly appointed - paintings, tapestries, furniture - as if
still inhabited by the living. But everything is gray with dust and age.
The floor is slick with moisture. The stone walls press close, cold and
damp.

north.description: The way leads to Mausoleum District

14009.name: Vampire's Mausoleum

14010.title: Ghoul Warren
14010.description:
Ghouls have burrowed into the ground here, creating a warren of tunnels.
The entrances are surrounded by gnawed bones. These creatures are
constantly hungry, feeding on the dead and dragging fresh corpses below.
They're intelligent enough to set traps and ambushes. Venturing into
their territory is extremely dangerous. The tunnels lead deep
underground. The air is thick and hard to breathe. The silence is
oppressive and watchful.

north.description: The way leads to The Charnel House

down.description: The way leads to Underground Burial Chambers

14010.name: Ghoul Warren

14011.title: Underground Burial Chambers
14011.description:
These chambers were cut from bedrock to hold the overflow when the
surface graveyards filled. Niches in the walls hold thousands of bodies.
The air is stale and thick with decay. Weak undead inhabit these
chambers - zombies and skeletons that mindlessly patrol. The darkness is
oppressive, broken only by occasional phosphorescent fungi. Darkness
clings to every surface. The silence is oppressive and watchful.

up.description: The way leads to Ghoul Warren

south.description: The way leads to The Ossuary

14011.name: Underground Burial Chambers

14012.title: The Ossuary
14012.description:
When bodies decayed, their bones were moved here - a room dedicated to
housing remains. Bones are stacked floor to ceiling in artistic
patterns. Skulls grin from elaborate arrangements. Femurs are stacked
like cord wood. The sheer number of dead represented here is staggering
- tens of thousands. Something powerful moves among the bones. The air
is thick and hard to breathe. The stone walls press close, cold and
damp.

north.description: The way leads to Underground Burial Chambers

14012.name: The Ossuary

14013.title: Catacombs
14013.description:
Ancient tunnels wind through the earth beneath the necropolis. These
catacombs are far older than the city above, carved by a civilization
long forgotten. Strange glyphs cover the walls. The passages branch and
twist, forming a maze. Wraiths haunt these tunnels, the ghosts of those
buried before recorded history. They hate the living with ancient
malice. The air is thick and hard to breathe. The silence is oppressive
and watchful.

west.description: The way leads to Underground Burial Chambers

south.description: The way leads to The Deep Crypts

14013.name: Catacombs

14014.title: The Deep Crypts
14014.description:
The oldest and deepest burial chambers lie here, sealed centuries ago.
The doors are warded with powerful magic meant to keep things in, not
out. Whatever was buried here was important - and dangerous. The seals
have weakened with age. Strange sounds emanate from beyond the doors,
and dark power leaks through cracks. The silence is oppressive and
watchful. Darkness clings to every surface.

east.description: The way leads to Ancient Burial Chamber

14014.name: The Deep Crypts

14015.title: Ancient Burial Chamber
14015.description:
This chamber predates the necropolis by millennia. The walls are carved
with symbols of an unknown culture. A stone sarcophagus dominates the
center, its lid carved with the image of a king. The magic here is
ancient and powerful. Something terrible sleeps within - an ancient evil
that should never wake. The temperature drops near the sarcophagus. The
silence is oppressive and watchful. Darkness clings to every surface.

west.description: The way leads to The Deep Crypts

14015.name: Ancient Burial Chamber

14016.title: Necromancer's Quarter
14016.description:
Living necromancers make their homes in this district, maintaining their
mortality while studying death. The buildings are surprisingly well-kept
- these scholars value their comfort. Lights burn in windows, and the
smell of cooking wafts from chimneys. But the atmosphere is still wrong.
These are people who have embraced darkness, who see the undead as tools
and death as a resource. The silence is oppressive and watchful.
Darkness clings to every surface.

north.description: The way leads to Plaza of Bones

south.description: The way leads to The Black Library

east.description: The way leads to Summoning Chamber

14016.name: Necromancer's Quarter

14017.title: The Black Library
14017.description:
This library contains the collected knowledge of necromancy from across
the ages. Shelves hold thousands of grimoires, tomes, and scrolls - all
dedicated to death magic. The rarest and most dangerous books are kept
in locked cages. Simply reading some of these texts could drive one mad
or corrupt the soul. Guards patrol constantly, both living and undead.
The silence is oppressive and watchful. The air is thick and hard to
breathe.

north.description: The way leads to Necromancer's Quarter

14017.name: The Black Library

14018.title: Summoning Chamber
14018.description:
Necromancers use this room to summon and bind undead servants. Circles
of power are drawn on the floor. Chains and shackles hang from walls for
restraining the rebellious. Jars hold components for dark rituals -
preserved organs, rare herbs, ground bones. The room reeks of death and
dark magic. Apprentices practice here under watchful supervision.
Darkness clings to every surface. The floor is slick with moisture.

west.description: The way leads to Necromancer's Quarter

14018.name: Summoning Chamber

14019.title: The Lich Tower Approach
14019.description:
A tower of black stone rises from the necropolis, taller than any other
structure. This is the domain of the ancient lich who rules here. The
tower seems to absorb light, and no bird will fly near it. The ground
around it is dead - not even weeds grow. A sense of overwhelming dread
emanates from the tower. Only the powerful or foolish approach. The
stone walls press close, cold and damp. The silence is oppressive and
watchful.

west.description: The way leads to Plaza of Bones

up.description: The way leads to Tower Entrance Hall

14019.name: The Lich Tower Approach

14020.title: Tower Entrance Hall
14020.description:
The tower interior is surprisingly ornate. Tapestries that should have
rotted centuries ago still hang on walls. Candles burn with cold flames.
The floor is polished marble, and a grand staircase winds upward. But
everything is wrong - the tapestries depict scenes of death, the candles
give no warmth, and the very air feels thin and lifeless. Skeleton
warriors stand guard. Darkness clings to every surface. The air is thick
and hard to breathe.

down.description: The way leads to The Lich Tower Approach

up.description: The way leads to Trophy Hall

14020.name: Tower Entrance Hall

14021.title: Trophy Hall
14021.description:
The lich displays trophies from victims here. Suits of armor stand
empty, their wearers long dead. Weapons of defeated heroes hang on
walls. Magical items that couldn't save their owners are arranged in
cases. Each trophy has a plaque describing the victim and how they died.
It's both memorial and warning - even the mighty fall to the lich. The
stone walls press close, cold and damp. Darkness clings to every
surface.

down.description: The way leads to Tower Entrance Hall

up.description: The way leads to Library of the Damned

14021.name: Trophy Hall

14022.title: Library of the Damned
14022.description:
The lich's personal library makes the Black Library look tame. These are
the rarest texts in existence - books that mere mortals shouldn't touch.
Some are bound in human skin, others written in blood, still others seem
to be alive in some horrible way. The knowledge here could reshape the
world - or destroy it. The lich guards this collection jealously. The
silence is oppressive and watchful. The stone walls press close, cold
and damp.

down.description: The way leads to Trophy Hall

up.description: The way leads to The Ritual Chamber

14022.name: Library of the Damned

14023.title: The Ritual Chamber
14023.description:
This room is dedicated to the lich's darkest work. The floor is one
massive circle of power, inlaid with precious metals and gems.
Channeling this much power would kill a normal mage - only the lich's
undead form allows it. The air crackles with potential energy. This is
where the lich performs the rituals that maintain the necropolis and
extend its power. The stone walls press close, cold and damp. The floor
is slick with moisture.

down.description: The way leads to Library of the Damned

up.description: The way leads to The Phylactery Chamber

14023.name: The Ritual Chamber

14024.title: The Phylactery Chamber
14024.description:
At the tower's pinnacle lies the lich's most guarded secret - its
phylactery, the vessel containing its soul. As long as the phylactery
exists, the lich cannot be permanently destroyed. The chamber is warded
with every protection spell known. Guardians stand eternal watch. The
phylactery itself is hidden, disguised as one of many identical objects.
Finding and destroying it is the only way to truly kill the lich. The
stone walls press close, cold and damp. The air is thick and hard to
breathe.

down.description: The way leads to The Ritual Chamber

14024.name: The Phylactery Chamber

14025.title: Graveyard of Heroes
14025.description:
This section contains the graves of those who died fighting the undead -
paladins, clerics, warriors of light. Their graves are marked with holy
symbols and prayers. But even here, corruption has taken hold. Some have
risen as death knights, their nobility twisted into service of evil.
Others remain at rest, but their graves are desecrated. It's a sad
reminder that even heroes fall. The air is thick and hard to breathe.
The silence is oppressive and watchful.

east.description: The way leads to Plaza of Bones

south.description: The way leads to Chapel of Lost Hope

14025.name: Graveyard of Heroes

14026.title: Chapel of Lost Hope
14026.description:
This chapel was built by survivors of the necropolis's fall, a place to
pray for deliverance. But the prayers went unanswered. The chapel stands
abandoned, its altar broken, its holy symbols defaced. Dust covers
everything. The only visitors now are undead who mock what this place
once represented. A sense of profound sadness permeates the air. The air
is thick and hard to breathe. The floor is slick with moisture.

north.description: The way leads to Graveyard of Heroes

14026.name: Chapel of Lost Hope

14027.title: The Bone Throne
14027.description:
In a grand hall sits a throne constructed entirely of bones - human and
otherwise. This is where the lich holds court, issuing commands to
lesser undead and receiving tribute from necromancer servants. The
throne radiates power and malevolence. The lich rarely occupies it
physically, preferring to work in the tower, but the throne represents
its authority over this realm of death. Darkness clings to every
surface. The air is thick and hard to breathe.

north.description: The way leads to The Lich Tower Approach

14027.name: The Bone Throne

14028.title: Execution Square
14028.description:
When the necropolis was alive, criminals were executed here. The
gallows, headsman's block, and stakes remain. Now the square has a new
purpose - the undead bring captured living here for transformation into
their ranks. The rituals performed here are brutal and terrifying.
Screams echo from this square at all hours. Bloodstains cover the
ancient stones. The air is thick and hard to breathe. The silence is
oppressive and watchful.

west.description: The way leads to Avenue of Tombs

14028.name: Execution Square

14029.title: The Corpse Market
14029.description:
In a grotesque mockery of commerce, necromancers trade in corpses and
parts here. Bodies are displayed like meat at a butcher shop, sorted by
quality and freshness. Organs are sold separately. Special components -
hearts of virgins, eyes of seers, bones of children - command premium
prices. The market is always busy, with necromancers haggling over their
gruesome wares. The stone walls press close, cold and damp. The air is
thick and hard to breathe.

east.description: The way leads to Necromancer's Quarter

west.description: The way leads to Verdant Dragon Lair

14029.name: The Corpse Market

14030.name: Verdant Dragon Lair
14030.description:
Thick green vapors coil through this cavern, pooling over mounds of bone
and treasure. The air burns the lungs. Vines strangle the stone itself,
feeding on the dragon's poisonous breath. Darkness clings to every
surface. The silence is oppressive and watchful.

east.description: The way leads to The Corpse Market

14000.name: skeleton warrior
14000.long_desc: A skeleton in ancient armor patrols here, sword in bony hand.
14000.description: This skeleton was once a warrior, and death hasn't erased its martial skill. It wears rusted plate armor and wields a notched sword with surprising competence. Unlike mindless zombies, these skeletons retain combat training from life. They're tireless, fearless, and never stop. Red flame burns in empty eye sockets, suggesting some intelligence remains.

14001.name: ghoul
14001.long_desc: A hunched, pale creature with long claws sniffs the air hungrily.
14001.description: Ghouls are created when people consume the flesh of the dead - a punishment that transforms them into monsters. This ghoul is barely recognizable as human. Its skin is pale and waxy, its fingers elongated into claws, its teeth filed to points. It moves with bestial grace, constantly hungry. Ghouls are intelligent enough to be truly dangerous, setting ambushes and working in packs.

14002.name: wraith
14002.long_desc: A dark figure drifts here, its form barely visible and utterly terrifying.
14002.description: Wraiths are the spirits of the truly evil, bound to the world by their malice. This creature is incorporeal, a shadow barely distinguishable from darkness. Its touch drains life force itself, weakening victims with each strike. Wraiths hate the living with a passion that transcends death. They can phase through walls and are immune to normal weapons. Only magic can harm them.

14003.name: vampire
14003.long_desc: A pale figure of terrible beauty watches you with predatory eyes.
14003.description: This vampire is centuries old, a master of undeath. It appears almost human - pale and beautiful, dressed in finery from a bygone age. But the illusion shatters when it opens its mouth to reveal fangs, or when you see the complete absence of humanity in its eyes. Vampires are incredibly strong, fast, and cunning. They can charm victims, turn into mist, and command lesser undead. Sunlight would destroy them, but here in eternal darkness they reign supreme.

14004.name: lich
14004.short_desc: Malachar the Undying, Master of the Necropolis
14004.long_desc: An ancient lich wrapped in rotting robes stands here, eyes burning with unholy power.
14004.description: Malachar was once a great archmage who chose lichdom over death. That was over a thousand years ago. Now he's something beyond human understanding - a being of pure will and magic housed in a desiccated corpse. His bones show through dried flesh, and his eyes are pits of green flame. He wears robes that were once magnificent, now moth-eaten and stained. But none of this diminishes his power. He's one of the most powerful spellcasters in existence, wielding necromancy that could threaten kingdoms. His phylactery makes him nearly immortal.

14005.name: necromancer
14005.long_desc: A robed figure studies a tome of forbidden knowledge, dark energy crackling around their fingers.
14005.description: This necromancer is still among the living, though they've dedicated their life to death magic. They're pale from spending time indoors studying, with dark circles under their eyes. Their robes are black and covered in arcane symbols. They can summon and command undead, drain life energy, and cast curses. While not as powerful as the lich master, they're still dangerous spellcasters. They see undeath as the next stage of existence and actively work toward transformation.

14000.name: necronomicon
14000.short_desc: an ancient book bound in strange leather
14000.long_desc: A tome of forbidden knowledge lies here, radiating dark power.
14000.description: This is one of the legendary books of necromancy, containing spells and rituals of immense power. The pages are human skin, the ink is blood, and the binding is something you can't identify and don't want to. Simply reading it could drive one mad, but the knowledge within could grant power over death itself. Necromancers would kill for this book.

14001.name: bone plate armor
14001.room_desc: Armor made of fused bones lies here.

14002.name: skull-topped staff
14002.room_desc: A staff topped with a skull lies here.

14003.name: death shroud cloak
14003.room_desc: A cloak of deathly shrouds lies here.

14004.name: ring of the lich
14004.room_desc: A ring pulsing with dark energy lies here.

14005.name: phylactery shard
14005.long_desc: A broken piece of gem-studded metal pulses with residual power.
14005.description: This is a piece of a destroyed phylactery - the vessel that held a lich's soul. Though broken, it still holds fragments of necromantic power. A skilled enchanter could use it as a component for powerful magic items. Simply carrying it makes you feel cold inside.

14010.name: a phylactery shard
14010.room_desc: A shard of a lich phylactery lies here.

14011.name: a bone circlet
14011.room_desc: A circlet fashioned from bone rests here.

14012.name: a soulreaver blade
14012.room_desc: A blade wreathed in pale flame lies here.

9101.name: verdant longbow
9101.room_desc: [95mA verdant long[92mbow[0m[95m of living wood lies here.[0m
9101.description: A ranger’s bow infused with poison‑green sap.

9102.name: shadowfang dagger
9102.description: A rogue’s dagger that drinks the light.

9103.name: venomblood sigil
9103.description: A deathknight’s sigil pulsing with toxic power.

9104.name: scale of the green dragon
9104.room_desc: [95mA green dragon scale lies here, slick with venom.[0m

14090.name: verdant shroud
14090.description: A moss‑lined shroud that swallows footsteps in the wild.

14091.name: stalker band
14091.description: A band that sharpens the strike of an ambush.

14092.name: wildpath charm
14092.room_desc: [92mA charm of woven vine rests here.[0m
14092.description: A charm that sharpens the senses for tracking.

14093.name: venomleaf talisman
14093.room_desc: [92mA talisman of dark leaves rests here.[0m
14093.description: A talisman that empowers poison magic.

14001.name: skeleton
14001.long_desc: A skeleton in rusted armor raises its sword.

14002.name: zombie
14002.long_desc: A shambling corpse reaches for you with decayed hands.

14003.name: wraith
14003.long_desc: A shadowy wraith floats through the air, its eyes glowing red.

14004.name: vampire
14004.long_desc: A pale vampire hisses, revealing its fangs.

14005.name: ghast
14005.long_desc: A ghast emits a nauseating stench as it approaches.

14006.name: specter
14006.long_desc: A translucent specter phases through the walls.

14007.name: necromancer
14007.long_desc: A robed necromancer channels dark energy.

14008.name: lich
14008.long_desc: An ancient lich sits upon a throne of bones, power radiating from its form.

14009.name: death knight
14009.long_desc: A death knight in black plate armor stands guard.

14010.name: banshee
14010.long_desc: A banshee shrieks, its voice chilling your soul.

14030.name: Verdraxx the Green Dragon
14030.long_desc: A massive green dragon lurks here, poison dripping from its fangs.

phases.message: [32mVerdraxx summons the dead from the earth! A necrotic aura fills the chamber![0m

abilities.name: Vine Entangle
abilities.telegraph: Vines erupt from the ground, grasping at you!

abilities.name: Venom Spit
abilities.telegraph: Verdraxx spits a glob of venom!

abilities.name: Necrotic Breath
abilities.telegraph: [35mVerdraxx exhales a wave of necrotic energy![0m

abilities.name: Raise Dead
abilities.telegraph: Verdraxx commands the dead to rise!

14098.name: restless ghost
14098.long_desc: A translucent ghost floats here, wringing its spectral hands in eternal distress.
14098.description: The ghost wears the faded remnants of a noble's attire. Its face is frozen in an expression of profound regret, and faint chains of ethereal light bind it to this place.

talk_responses.hello: The ghost wails softly. 'I was a lord of these lands, once. I sought eternal life and found eternal death instead. The necromancer promised salvation — he delivered damnation. His phylactery is hidden in the deepest crypt, pulsing with stolen souls. Destroy it, and perhaps we can all finally rest.'
talk_responses.necromancer: The ghost's form flickers with rage. 'He was my court wizard. I trusted him. He murdered us all in a single night and raised us as his servants. The crypt beneath the great mausoleum — that is where his power dwells.'
talk_responses.default: The ghost stares at its translucent hands, murmuring. 'What have I become...'
talk_responses.next: The ghost's hollow voice echoes. 'There are places darker still than this graveyard. The Dragon's Domain... fire and death await there. And the Plane of Eternal Chaos — reality itself unravels. Only the truly powerful survive such places.'

14099.name: grave keeper
14099.long_desc: A hunched grave keeper shuffles here, lantern in one hand and shovel in the other.
14099.description: He is the only living soul who dwells in the Necropolis willingly. His skin is sallow, his eyes permanently red-rimmed, and he speaks to the dead more than the living.

talk_responses.hello: The grave keeper eyes you wearily. 'Another hero come to cleanse the dead. They all say that. Most end up joining my... residents. Word of advice — the skeletons are mindless, easy. The ghouls are cunning. But the wraiths... the wraiths remember who they were. That makes them dangerous. And angry.'
talk_responses.dead: He leans on his shovel. 'Don't disturb the sealed tombs. Some things are buried for a reason. The ones with iron chains on the doors? Those aren't to keep robbers out. They're to keep what's inside IN.'
talk_responses.default: The grave keeper hums a funeral dirge and adjusts a crooked headstone.
